name: Floatsquare
overview:
Floatsquare makes the hassles and costs constraints of custom software a thing of the past by enabling users to mold the architecture of FloatSquare to almost any organization structure using a simple user friendly interface that can be thought of as a digital ball of clay - no coding knowledge needed.

FloatSquare is a unique business innovation, because due to the cost of building or buying proprietary software, only large enterprises employ a software program that models their entire business system, but with Floatsquare we turn the principle of the triple constraints on its head by offering users a time & cost effective business solution whilst guaranteeing a quality product that essentially strives to convert your company into a cloud based paperless system whilst managing your company from anywhere in the world with our seamless data integration.
